title: 49 SOLUTIONS

images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.9M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with 49 SOLUTIONS. The average
  contract duration was 0.95 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $540.8K. The longest
  contract was 2.43 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.6M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.9M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '16'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '31%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '249%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.6'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '3.4M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.95'
s421_mean_contract_value: '540.8K'
s425_max_duration: '2.43'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.6M'
---
